arn.description: The ARN of the lightsail certificate.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the instance was created.

domainName.description: A domain name for which the certificate should be issued.

domainValidationOptions.description: Set of domain validation objects which can be used to complete certificate validation. Can have more than one element, e.g., if SANs are defined.

name.description: The name of the Lightsail load balancer.

subjectAlternativeNames.description: Set of domains that should be SANs in the issued certificate. `domain_name` attribute is automatically added as a Subject Alternative Name.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. To create a key-only tag, use an empty string as the value. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

name.description: The name of the Lightsail load balancer.

subjectAlternativeNames.description: Set of domains that should be SANs in the issued certificate. `domain_name` attribute is automatically added as a Subject Alternative Name.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Certificate resources.
